meanings.definition: To dress or groom oneself carefully or smartly.
meanings.sent1: She prinks in front of the mirror before going out.
meanings.sent2: He always prinks before important meetings.
meanings.sent3: Sarah prinks so much that she's always late!
meanings.sent4: The peacock prinks its feathers to impress the other birds.
meanings.sent5: Watching her prinks is like watching an artist at work.

meanings.definition: To spend time making minor adjustments to one's appearance.
meanings.sent1: Before the party, she prinks her hair and makeup.
meanings.sent2: He prinks his tie to make sure it's straight.
meanings.sent3: Tom prinks so long that he misses the movie!
meanings.sent4: The gardener prinks the flowers in the garden every morning.
meanings.sent5: Her constant prinks show her attention to detail.
